div.p: This is a demo SPA (Single Page Application) making use of aspLite. Various sample forms, plugins and utilities are showcased over here. The location of the ASP-code involved, is displayed each time.
For the record, a "Single Page Application" does not mean that this is a "small" application. This SPA holds a few dozen of Ajax forms. But that can easily grow to 100 for larger SPA's.

This demo also executes only 1 ASP page: default.asp in the root of this installation. That ASP file acts as a dispatcher (handler) for all events that occur in the application. See /default/handler.asp.
Have fun while discovering the bits and bytes of this demo!
